byline.original: By MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ and CHRIS DIXON

abstract: Pastors, politicians and congregations across region gather in Charleston, SC, to remember massacre of nine members of Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church year ago; many make impassioned calls for more action to address gun violence.
lead_paragraph: A service held on the first anniversary of the deadly attack was marked by prayers, music and impassioned demands to curb unceasing gun violence.

headline.main: At Memorial for Charleston Shooting, a Call for ‘Meaningful Action’ on Guns
headline.print_headline: At Charleston Memorial, a Call for ‘Meaningful Action’ on Guns

snippet: A service held on the first anniversary of the deadly attack was marked by prayers, music and impassioned demands to curb unceasing gun violence.
